name: Transit Status Display
description: A data visualization displaying transit status using color-coded circles to represent the state of transit lines.

atoms.name: Status Circle - Green
atoms.description: Represents a healthy or on-time status.

atoms.name: Status Circle - Yellow
atoms.description: Represents a minor delay or issue.

atoms.name: Status Circle - Orange
atoms.description: Represents a moderate delay or issue.

atoms.name: Status Circle - Black
atoms.description: Represents a significant delay or issue.

atoms.name: Section Header
atoms.description: Used for the main section titles (e.g., 'Today - Live').

best_for: Displaying the state of multiple systems at a glance
avoid_for: When accessibility requires more than color-coding
